PROJECT_PROFILE.TARGETS: iOS (Primary), Android, Web App, Mobile PWA

CONSTRAINT.RULE: Network is hostile. Trust no inputs.

CONSTRAINT.DEFINITION: PII includes: Names, DoD IDs, SSNs, Emails, Phone Numbers.

CONSTRAINT.RULE: Auth Tokens -> Expo SecureStore (Native) or Encrypted Cookie (Web).
General Data -> SQLite (Encrypted) or AsyncStorage (Non-sensitive only).
NEVER store PII or Tokens in plain AsyncStorage.
